channel.title: [639] Help adding Ring of Vigour to Eclipse [639]
channel.description: Hello Moparscape helpers, i got a idea for my server... So the idea is too add the vigour ring! Can someone give me a tutorial or tell me how :P?

item.title: [639] Help adding Ring of Vigour to Eclipse [639]
item.dc:creator: @perryman perryman
item.description:
@perryman wrote:

Looks like a good tutorial from you Thank’s!
But i wonder if u can do this throught teamviewer on my vps?

Read full topic
item.source: [639] Help adding Ring of Vigour to Eclipse [639]

item.title: [639] Help adding Ring of Vigour to Eclipse [639]
item.dc:creator: @Liam_Baby Liam Baby
item.description:
@Liam_Baby wrote:

I’ve never used eclipse and never gone higher than the 525+ revision.

But my best guess is to download the models for the Ring of Vigour. And put the .dat files of the model of it into your raw cache.
open up itemdef.java or itemdef2.java and put the ints into their. Then finally spawn it into your item.cfg

Hope this helps

Read full topic
